metadata.Title: CVE-2022-26362 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: x86 pv: Race condition in typeref acquisition Xen maintains a typereference count for pages, in addition to a regular reference count. Thisscheme is used to maintain invariants required for Xen's safety, e.g. PVguests may not have direct writeable access to pagetables; updates needauditing by Xen. Unfortunately, the logic for acquiring a type referencehas a race condition, whereby a safely TLB flush is issued too early andcreates a window where the guest can re-establish the read/write mappingbefore writeability is prohibited.

criterions.comment: xen package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
